elements.label: URL
elements.helpText: This is the link to your form from WCA. You must use https for the form to load properly.

elements.label: Height
elements.helpText: Height of WCA iframe (e.g. 300px, 100%). If not set, the width defaults to fill available space.

elements.label: Width
elements.helpText: Width of WCA iframe (e.g. 300px, 100%). If not set, the width defaults to 100%.
